title: Replay Media Catcher 7.0.0.17 + patch - Crackingpatching
description:
[b]Description:[/b]
Replay Media Catcher 7.0.0.17  There is a desire to acquaint you with the program that I liked earlier, because it was necessary, the essence of the development is that it is able to capture digital reproductions from a large number of Internet sources. For example, you are watching YouTube and do not know how to save the video, let's say you do not have a download manager that intercepts links, there are no plug-ins for the browser, you start the program, press the Start button, then turn on the video and it will automatically be saved through this application, very convenient on In fact, you can download the Replay Media Catcher below.
The entire list of sites with which the program works simply does not need to be listed, and it is generally not needed here, since it works independently of this, it simply intercepts the streaming data and immediately saves it, of course, it is desirable before you choose a location on the hard disk where all files will be Loaded, in general, a lot of parameters, I advise them to dig. Replay Media Catcher can automatically and maybe manually save media data, the difference is that the program either will or will not ask a question about whether you want to download the intercepted media stream.
Replay Media Catcher can simultaneously load a lot of data, please note that the program has a built-in FLV player, through which you can immediately view the video that you downloaded. By the way, I want to note, there are sites (there are few of them, but still) from which it is impossible to download a video, for example from IDM or a plug-in in the browser, and Replay Media Catcher will cope with this task. In general, I think the essence is clear to everyone, if there is a desire can test the development in the case, I hope you will like it.

Developer: Applian Technologies Inc
License: ShareWare
Language: Multi
The size: 32.72 MB
OS: Windows

[b]How to Install:[/b]
1). Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed.
2). Thats all, Done & enjoy
